languages.text: Открытые участки тела испещрены ровными глубокими порезами, словно кто-то смаковал каждый кусочек отрезанной плоти.

traits.locale_text: Открытые участки тела испещрены ровными глубокими порезами, словно кто-то смаковал каждый кусочет отрезанной плоти.

languages.text: The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.
languages.original_text: Открытые участки тела испещрены ровными глубокими порезами, словно кто-то смаковал каждый кусочек отрезанной плоти.

traits.locale_text: The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.
The open areas of the body are riddled with deep even cuts, as if someone had savoured each piece of severed flesh.
The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.
The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.
The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.

languages.text: 遺体の引き裂かれた部分は、均等な深い切り傷で痛めつけられている。何者かが切り落とした肉を一切れ一切れ丁寧に味わったかのようだ。
languages.original_text: The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.

traits.locale_text: 遺体の引き裂かれた部分は、均等な深い切り傷で痛めつけられている。何者かが切り落とした肉を一切れ一切れ丁寧に味わったかのようだ。

languages.text: Las zonas expuestas de este cuerpo están marcadas por una serie de cortes constantes y profundos, como si alguien hubiera saboreado cada trozo de carne cortada.
languages.original_text: The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.

traits.locale_text: Las zonas expuestas de este cuerpo están marcadas por una serie de cortes constantes y profundos, como si alguien hubiera saboreado cada trozo de carne cortada.

languages.text: 尸体裸露的皮肤上，留下了一道又一道深而均匀的伤口，似乎有人故意切下了那些肉片，以便细细品尝。
languages.original_text: The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.

traits.locale_text: 尸体裸露的皮肤上，留下了一道又一道深而均匀的伤口，似乎有人故意切下了那些肉片，以便细细品尝。

languages.text: Le corps est parsemé de profondes entailles régulières, comme si quelqu'un avait détaillé avec soin chaque morceau avant de le savourer.
languages.original_text: The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.

traits.locale_text: Le corps est parsemé de profondes entailles régulières, comme si quelqu'un avait détaillé avec soin chaque morceau avant de le savourer.

languages.text: Die nackten Stellen des Körpers sind übersät von tiefen, gleichmäßigen Schnitten, als habe jemand jedes einzelne Stück abgetrenntes Fleisch bewusst genossen.
languages.original_text: The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.

traits.locale_text: Die nackten Stellen des Körpers sind übersät von tiefen, gleichmäßigen Schnitten, als habe jemand jedes einzelne Stück abgetrenntes Fleisch bewusst genossen.

languages.text: Vücudun açıkta kalan kısımları, aynı hizada atılmış derin kesiklerle kaplı... Sanki birisi, kesilen her bir et parçasının tadını çıkarmak istemiş.
languages.original_text: The open areas on the body are riddled with deep, even cuts, as if someone had been savouring each piece of severed flesh.
